ing: 1/3 cup tahini, or more to taste
1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, or to taste
1/2 lemon, juiced, or more to taste
1 teaspoon paprika, or more to taste
1 teaspoon water, or more as needed
des: "I got this recipe from my brother-in-law's uncle, and I absolutely love it! A different BBQ sauce that is different than the usual. You must try this! This is a recipe that is open to changes of the amount of each ingredient until it's to your liking. Use as a dip or pour over your meat of choice. It goes wonderful with chicken!"
ins: Mix yogurt, tahini, vinegar, parsley, lemon juice, garlic, paprika, water, cayenne pepper, and salt in a bowl until smooth.
